proposal_summary.hypothesis_tested: Is STRESS an independent failure mode or BEAR-derived?

test_1_temporal_overlap.question: Do STRESS forecasts occur on same days as BEAR forecasts?
test_1_temporal_overlap.interpretation: STRESS and BEAR share market conditions

test_2_asset_overlap.question: Do STRESS and BEAR affect the same assets?
test_2_asset_overlap.interpretation: STRESS affects different specific assets than BEAR

test_3_crypto_representation.question: Is STRESS a crypto-specific artifact?
test_3_crypto_representation.interpretation: STRESS is primarily an equity phenomenon

classification_result.reasoning: Same market conditions (90% temporal overlap) but different assets (0% overlap) indicates STRESS captures BEAR-like uncertainty on different securities during same market stress periods

ruled_out.reason: Pattern is clear despite small sample (n=10)

classification_result.sample_caveat: n=10 STRESS forecasts - finding should be monitored as sample grows

nodes.content: Mechanism clarification frame - test if STRESS is independent or derived
Temporal overlap test - 90% same days as BEAR
Asset overlap test - 0% shared with BEAR
Synthesis - Same conditions + different assets = derived manifestation

q2_q5_traceability.q5_hindsight: STRESS collapses into BEAR mechanism - no new information

epistemic_findings.primary: STRESS is not an independent failure mode
epistemic_findings.secondary: STRESS represents BEAR-like uncertainty applied to different assets during market stress
epistemic_findings.tertiary: Temporal correlation (90%) stronger than asset correlation (0%)
epistemic_findings.implication: Error surface map can treat STRESS as BEAR extension, not separate category
epistemic_findings.portfolio_implication: UMA-SHADOW-003 adds NO NEW INFORMATION to error surface

UMA-SHADOW-002.finding: BULL moderate overconfidence (62.59% wrong) with crypto vulnerability

portfolio_status.combined_insight: Error surface has 2 independent dimensions (BEAR structural + BULL contextual), not 3

ceo_review_required.key_question: Does mechanism clarification satisfy CEO-DIR-2026-071 requirements?
ceo_review_required.recommendation: Consider UMA-SHADOW-004 (Temporal clustering) for next exploration
